Conjuration 3

Summon Jaguars

Various nations(5)

Ritual
N2H1
spell id [id]: 391
effect number [effect_number]: 1
damage [damage]: 859
number of effects [nreff]: 17
gems required [gemcost]: 25N
Summon Units:#859 Jaguar x 17
The caster summons seventeen Jaguars and binds them to service. Jaguars are feared and revered as the great hunters of the forest. They are sacred to the people and sacred warriors don jaguar hides.
